A: Section A: Objective Questions
1. What color is grass (a) blue (b) green (c) red?
2. A cat says (a) woof (b) meow (c) moo?
3. True or False: The sun is cold?
5. How many eyes do you have (a) one (b) two (c) three?
6. A circle has _ corners?
7. What shape is a stop sign (a) circle (b) square (c) octagon?
8. True or False: Birds can fly?
9. Tom has 8 toy cars. He gives 4 cars to his friend. How many cars does Tom have left (a) 3 (b) 4 (c) 5?
10. What animal lays eggs (a) cow (b) chicken (c) dog?
11. What color is a carrot (a) purple (b) orange (c) yellow?
12. What number comes after 7 (a) 6 (b) 8 (c) 9?
13. True or False: Fish live on land?
14. A bird has 2 wings. How many wings do 3 birds have (a) 4 (b) 5 (c) 6?
15. How many wheels does a bicycle have (a) one (b) two (c) three?
16. What is the opposite of up (a) down (b) left (c) right?
17. What do you wear on your feet (a) hat (b) socks (c) gloves?
18. True or False: A triangle has four sides?
20. What is the first letter of the alphabet (a) B (b) A (c) C?
21. What color is the sky (a) green (b) blue (c) pink?
22. What animal says quack (a) pig (b) duck (c) horse?
23. True or False: You use your nose to smell?
24. There are 6 flowers in a vase. If you add 3 more flowers, how many flowers are there now (a) 8 (b) 9 (c) 10?
25. How many fingers are on one hand (a) four (b) five (c) six?
26. What shape is a door (a) circle (b) rectangle (c) triangle?
27. What do you drink water with (a) spoon (b) cup (c) fork?
28. True or False: Winter is a hot season?
29. Mary has 5 cookies. She eats 2 cookies. How many cookies are left (a) 2 (b) 3 (c) 4?
30. What is the name of our planet (a) Mars (b) Earth (c) Moon?
31. What color is a fire truck (a) blue (b) red (c) yellow?
32. What number comes before 10 (a) 9 (b) 11 (c) 8?
33. True or False: A spider has eight legs?
34. A cat has 4 legs. How many legs do 2 cats have (a) 6 (b) 7 (c) 8?
35. How many days are in a week (a) five (b) six (c) seven)?
36. What is the opposite of big (a) tall (b) small (c) wide?
37. What do you use to cut paper (a) pencil (b) scissors (c) glue?
38. True or False: A square has four equal sides?
40. What is the last letter of the alphabet (a) X (b) Y (c) Z?
41. What color is snow (a) black (b) white (c) grey?
42. What animal says roar (a) bear (b) lion (c) tiger?
43. True or False: You use your ears to see?
44. If you have 3 red balls and 2 blue balls, how many balls do you have in total (a) 4 (b) 5 (c) 6?
45. How many toes do you have on one foot (a) four (b) five (c) six?
46. What shape is a pizza (a) square (b) circle (c) triangle?
47. What do you use to brush your teeth (a) comb (b) toothbrush (c) soap?
48. True or False: Summer is a cold season?
49. There are 10 birds on a tree. 5 birds fly away. How many birds are left on the tree (a) 4 (b) 5 (c) 6?
50. What is the name of the biggest star (a) Moon (b) Sun (c) Earth?
B: 3. What is the first letter of the alphabet_________?
4. How many fingers are on one hand_________?
5. What color is the sky on a sunny day_________?
C: 1. Name one fruit that is red.
2. What is the name of the planet we live on?
3. What do you use to write?
4. Name one animal that lives in water.
5. What is the name of the season when leaves fall off trees?
